message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to someone in your position.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,250?
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,750?
